body:
Not a problem. If there was a bug introduced in cross compilation then we'd
want to know about it, this is never a waste of time.

On Tue, Dec 1, 2015 at 3:28 PM, Matt Aimonetti <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I feel very embarrassed, @mattn <https://github.com/mattn> was totally
> right in his first comment, the issue was that in my own code, I was using
> path.Dir instead of filepath.Dir which didn't behave as expected. I was
> then testing on linux and OS X and didn't re-crosscompile to test until
> right now.
>
> I'm extremely sorry to have wasted everybody's time but I'll take this
> opportunity to mention that I'm very thankful to all of you for being so
> kind and helpful.
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/13437#issuecomment-160850148>.
>
